title: I’m Hungry VR Directly Download
description:
Play the role of a fast-food restaurant employee in I’m Hungry VR game. You can definitely learn how to make fries, hamburgers and milk shake in the VR world and possibly the real world, as well The game takes advantage of the VR technique, and it perfectly shows a realistic vision of a fast-food kitchen to the gamers.
In addition, the controller and the sensing technique can truly restore the various postures of the player while stimulating the fast-food restaurant employee’s work. Since the player’s in-game operation is exactly the same as the moving speed in the real world, the player won’t feel uncomfortable while playing I’m Hungry. Enjoy your fast-food restaurant experience

system_requirements.Processor: Intel i3-6100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200X or greater
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
